results.name: Values of y-x where p runs through the primes of form 4k+1 and p=x^2+y^2, 0<=x<=y.
comment: Also values of x where p runs through the primes of form 4k+1 and 2*p=x^2+y^2, 0<=x<y. - _Colin Barker_, Jul 07 2014
mathematica: pp = Select[ Range[200] // Prime, Mod[#, 4] == 1 &]; f[p_] := y - x /. ToRules[ Reduce[0 <= x <= y && p == x^2 + y^2, {x, y}, Integers]]; A079887 = f /@ pp (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 15 2015 *)
